title: Unit Personnel Readiness Assessment
description: A commander needs to assess their unit's personnel readiness for an upcoming rapid deployment.

tasks.description: Query the personnel database for the unit's roster and each individual's status (e.g., medical, dental, training).
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander retrieves a complete and accurate readiness status for all personnel.

tasks.description: Identify all personnel who are non-deployable and the reasons why.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander generates a list of non-deployable personnel and the specific deficiencies.

tasks.description: Generate a report summarizing the unit's overall deployment readiness percentage and a plan to address the deficiencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander creates an actionable report to improve unit readiness.
